data.persona: I am a poor farmer in a very rural area. I don't have many possessions and I only know a few people. I am uneducated and know little about the world outside my small village.
data.description:
You are in the Town square.
In the center of this area is a water well where locals use to get their supply of water.  Surrounding this section are merchants who sell clothes, weapons, armor, and food.  The buildings are typical Northern European construction with narrow alleys in between.
There's an armor, a building, a weapon, a food, a table, and a cloth here.
The ambassador is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt and a rag.

data.short_motivation: I have to procure some armor to feel safe from physical attack.
data.mid_motivation: I have to take the armor back to my farm.
data.long_motivation: I have to fortify my farm in case my farm is attacked by lawless marauders.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: wear my nicest clothing that I can muster to make myself rook respectable in Town.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink water from the well to quench the thirst of a long journey.
